content: to prevent a hole not to twist the sts knit one round pm and work across instep sts in established pattern pm and pick up and knit 18 20 sts along cuff the other edge of the heel flap as before you will round 1 k1 p1 repeat to end now have 31 35 instep sts and 57 63 sole sts k10 11 sts and pm for new beginning of round repeat round 1 14 times in total bor leg work either the written or chart instructions for set up round k11 12 ktbl 18 20 sm work next your size pattern row sm ktbl 18 20 k to end repeat rnds 1-20 three times 60 rnds total round 1 k to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm work next pattern row sm k1 ssk k to end heel flap round 2 k to m sm work next pattern row sm k to turn work so that the wrong side is facing end the heel flap will be worked back and forth over repeat round 1 & 2 until 33 37 sole sts remain the next 33 37 sts the remaining 31 35 sts are remove bor marker and knit to next marker this the instep sts the stitches are distributed this way is the new bor so that the pattern on the foot is symmetrical row 1 ws p33 37 foot row 2 rs sl1 k1 to last st sl1 continue working in established pattern until the repeat row 1 and 2 a total of 16 18 times 32 foot measures 2 inches or 5 cm shorter than the 36 row total then work row 1 again total foot length you require on the last round work 31 35 instep sts rm k1 replace m and k to end you will now have 32 36 heel turn sts for both the instep and sole before you start row 1 rs sl1 k til 13 15 sts remain ssk k1 decreasing for the toe turn row 2 ws sl1 p til 13 15 sts remain p2tog toe p1 turn round 1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 sm row 3 sl1 k to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn k1 ssk k to 3 st before m k2tog k1 row 4 sl1 p to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn round 2 k repeat row 3 & 4 until all stitches have been worked and 21 23 heel sts remain repeat rnds 1 & 2 until 24 sts remain cut yarn leaving a 12 inch / 30 cm tail graft sts together gusset using kitchener stitch weave in ends and block note if you are using magic loop you should maintain the instep sts on one needle and the sole sts on the other needle additionally you will only 3 @twinsetandpurl ©rachel fletcher 2023 #kinggeorgesocks written instructions - king round 7 k3 1/1 lc k2 1/1 rc p1 × 3 k1 george pattern
